short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the top sites in the popup window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Top Sites is a convenient Google Chrome extension that puts your favorite websites right at your fingertips! Say goodbye to endless bookmarks and tabs – with My Top Sites, access your most visited sites instantly from the popup window.

Key Features:

Instant Access: Easily view and open your frequently visited websites directly from the popup window.

Customizable List: Personalize your top sites list with the websites you use most, tailored to your preferences.

Organized Interface: Enjoy a clean and organized interface that makes finding your top sites a breeze.

Intelligent Sorting: Sites are intelligently sorted based on your usage, ensuring quick access to your most relevant sites.

Effortless Navigation: Say goodbye to bookmark clutter and tab overload – My Top Sites streamlines your browsing experience.
